summary:
Adds an estate or large home (whatever you take of it :) to the rift, relatively close to riften really. The home itself is actually a no load door home. 

Whats on offer!!!
- No manny\'s here sorry
- Lots of categorized storage
- Kitchen
- Main bedroom
- Vault and much more
descriptionHtml:
Adds an estate or large home (whatever you take of it :) to the rift, relatively close to riften really. The home itself is actually a no load door home. Its not perfect at the moment... However keep in mind that everything was hand placed by a rookie (not a pro) and this IS my second home mod. I have no idea why I decided on a no load door home, just liked the thought of it I guess. I hope you enjoy this mod as much as I did making it. I am open to suggestions and ideas on improving it.

Whats on offer!!!
- No manny\'s here sorry
- Lots of categorized storage
- Kitchen
- Main bedroom
- Storage area
- Alchemy Room
- Useless fishing dock
- Almost all crafting (left out Enchanter)
- Vault and much more

To do

- Navmesh
- Allow for spouse and perhaps build another room for others

Changelog
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
0.2

- Added chopping block
- Added map marker (the 20 people who uploaded my mod wasted 12mb of data only to find that my house was REALLY hard to find)

0.3

- Added a balcony of some sort which combat can be practiced on. Training dummies stand for you to smash them !!!! With whatever you want 
- Changed the walls in the bedroom and around the house
- Changed the kitchen
- Ironed out some of the horrible walls, they were overlapping
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits
- Chesko... I\'m sure Ive added something of his (if not I will)
- There are others but I have a terrible memory (let me know if your one of those people)
author: Draemonx
